ii. Approvals obtained by the Company for the premises situated at DSIIC's Industrial built-up property bearing no. 3, Pocket - H, Sector - 5, Bawana Industrial Complex, Bawana, Delhi – 110039, India.

1. Factory License bearing no. NFL1202319815 having date of approval as July 24, 2023 and date of generation as July 21, 2023 under the Factories Act, 1948 and the rules made thereunder for use of the 1st floor of the said premises as a Factory and is valid till March 31, 2026.
